Faith.christ: In this year of grace, fifteen hundred and eighty-three, the humble folk of our village did kneel in prayer, seeking the mercy and blessings of Christ, the Redeemer of mankind.
Faith.faith: They may receive forgiveness of sins, and an inheritance among those who are sanctified by faith in Christ.
Faith.sins: They may receive forgiveness of sins, and an inheritance among those who are sanctified by faith in Christ.

Money.money: In this year of our Lord, fifteen hundred and eighty-three, the merchants of London did rejoice greatly, for the exchange of goods did bring forth much money, enriching the coffers of our fair city.
Money.gold: In the year of our Lord, fourteen hundred and seventy-eight, the noble knights did embark on their quest, seeking the fabled lands where gold flowed like rivers and the earth was rich with untold treasures.
Money.rich: In the year of our Lord, fourteen hundred and seventy-eight, the noble knights did embark on their quest, seeking the fabled lands where gold flowed like rivers and the earth was rich with untold treasures.
